content: well hello crafters and gamers I want to show you my newest creation it is for a

to use it and that's exactly what any with the rocket so I just have all the
components in boxes all ready to go and I put a few details on the back in the
front of the boxes to make it look like a rocket and it's just really cool I'm
really happy with it so let's hit my table and I'll show you
what it looks like and I'll talk about what the components are in the ship
